description:
Semaphore lakes area is a short distance from well maintained gravel road.  
The area offers a quick access base to surrounding "school of railroad mountains" such as Locomotive, Tender, Caboose, Handcar, Faceless, Face etc.
directions: Go upstream on Pemberton Valley from Pemberton intersection.  In 20k, turn right to go into Hurnley Forest Service road.   There is a bridge in 19k, a small waterfall on the right in 21k, then there is a small pull out place on the left at 22k.  There is a flagging to go down to flat section of the trail off the road.
title: Semaphore Lakes
